meanings.definition: sumoists: plural noun, individuals who participate in the sport of sumo wrestling
meanings.sent1: The sumoists trained hard to improve their wrestling skills.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered for the sumoists during the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The sumoists decided to have a friendly match in the park.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sumo wrestling, the sumoists are like giants battling on the ring.
meanings.sent5: The sumoists' dedication to their craft is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: sumoists: plural noun, practitioners of sumo wrestling
meanings.sent1: Many sumoists travel around the country to compete in tournaments.
meanings.sent2: The sumoists' traditional attire adds to the spectacle of the sport.
meanings.sent3: The sumoists' daily diet includes a lot of rice and protein.
meanings.sent4: The sumoists' strength and agility are unmatched in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The sumoists' training regimen is rigorous and demanding.

meanings.definition: sumoists: plural noun, members of the sumo wrestling community
meanings.sent1: The sumoists support each other like a big family.
meanings.sent2: The sumoists gather for a traditional ceremony before the match.
meanings.sent3: The sumoists organize charity events to give back to the community.
meanings.sent4: The sumoists' camaraderie is evident both on and off the ring.
meanings.sent5: The sumoists' unity is what makes the sport so special.
